title: TrumpTwitter: A simple yet insightful console application
author: jacob9706
content: readme.md trumptwitter simple use console application exploring trump's twitter feed.overviewtrumptwitter exposes ability anyone search through trumps tweets view info where posts from.getting starteddownload install trumptwitter https://github.com/jacob-ebey/trumptwitter/raw/master/trumptwitter/publish/trumptwitter.1.0.exe. recommend setting vscode your default .json editor. using search command, results be opened your defaulttext editor. the editor supports file refreshing vscode does, file be hot updated the editor window.view metadata only metadata this is source trumps tweets. example:command (help): meta give console output similar :sources: 'twitter iphone' tweeted 1500 times 'twitter ads' tweeted 23 times 'media studio' tweeted 2 times 'twitter android' tweeted 1268 times 'twitter web client' tweeted 196 times 'periscope' tweeted 1 times 'twitter ipad' tweeted 20 times 'instagram' tweeted 1 timessearch trump's tweets keywords can search multiple keywords separating with | character. example:command (help): search russia|putin give console output similar :found 69 tweets since apr 30 2016 containing 'russia' 'putin'. open results your default .json editor.viewing tweets can view specific tweet id retrieve immidiate tweets before after. example:command (help): view 846533818811080704 give console output:{ "id": 846533818811080704, "fulltext": "why isn't house intelligence committee looking the bill & hillary deal allowed big uranium go russia, russian speech....", "source": "< href=\"http://twitter.com/download/iphone\"
